Understanding Legal Marketing.

Introducing Campaign Tracker. An invaluable tool that takes the mystery out of tracking and measuring your advertising success.

Play video

Legal Marketing Simplified.

Campaign Tracker helps law firms see exactly how their advertising efforts are paying off. This is the first time, within one fully integrated practice management product, firms are able to determine where their marketing budget is generating results.

Effortlessly create campaigns that track leads acquired through ads and/or online forms. Leads that convert to clients are easily tracked through their entire lifecycle linking them back to the marketing initiative and associated revenue, allowing for ROI analysis and ongoing marketing optimization -- it's that simple.




Start spending wisely with Campaign Tracker by Clio.

Setup a campaign.

Launch an advertising campaign. Learn which sources generate the most leads.

Track print activities.

Add a unique toll free or local phone number for each campaign. Easily track leads back to their source to see how campaigns are performing.

Track online activities.

Embed a form on a website, or track activity through Google Adwords. The webform will allow you to track leads that come in through either method.

Automatic caller ID.

If you miss a potential client's call, a lead will automatically populate in Clio for future follow up.

Analyze and optimize.

Scrutinize your return-on-investment (ROI) to see which campaigns are the most effective at generating interest and revenue.
